unnormalised: Dhyan dii, mottea dhombaraachea Bhaarotii lognanchi yojna korpi lokanno! Tumchea kaalneracher nokond korat 'kaaran fuddlea 2 vorshankhatir tarikho baahir poddlyat â€“ aani te poorn rokhthokth ascheaa. Jyotishi sangtaa ki Novehmbor 2024 mhunnttlear Diwali mhuntllya uprant thodde shubh divas aasa, ji 31/10/2024 rer yetli.
normalised: Dhyaan dii, bhaaratantlya mottea dhondd-dhondda lagnaanchi yojnaa kortolea lokaanonk! tumchiin tiithiin nondo korun ghea, kaaraan don vorsaanche taarikaa bhair poddlyaat - aani te bharaun bartolyo. jyotishee sangtaat Novembara doon hazaar chovis Diwaali-ichem thoddem upkaarik dis aasaa, tem ekatris Octobara doon hazaar chovisaar poddtta.

unnormalised: Disotthaa, khuup kutumbh te tarikhek nodar thevtaat 'kaaran tumka khabar aasa, bori muhurta mhunnttlear sukhi logn, barem na? Magir tumka Dezembor '24 puurn aasa, punn yaad dovrat, Christmus aani Navea Vorasankhatir 25/12 rer soglle thode mandh yetta.
normalised: distaa, kitleyaach gharaanchea lokaanche dolle tea tarikaanche assaa kaaraan tumkaank kallela, borem muhurat mhanllear sukhi lagna, borabara? maga tumkaank ekunech December doon hazaar chovis aasaa, punn yaad dovorat, ponchis December-ak Christmas aani New Year-aak sogllem kaam thoddem mandaauntaa.

unnormalised: 2025 rer sorleaar, Jenwari bari disttaa, khas tor Makar Sankranti rer, 14/01/2025 rer. Punn Chaturmas-acho kaal todda, zo kitem Julai rer suru zaata (neemchich tarik zaheer kortele) aani sumar 4 mahinyaam meren choltaa. Tevhnn kaim logn nhoi, sakhtt.
normalised: Doon hazaar ponchisaar yetolee, Janewaar vaait disonaa, khas korun Makar Sankranti choudah Janewaar doon hazaar ponchisaak. punn Chaturmas period-ak talchea, tem kadinch Julyant shuru jaataa (khari taarik zaheer kortole) aani sumaar char mhoine choltaa. tennaa lagnaachi ekdum bandi.

unnormalised: Aani fuddem chintop korpea lokankhatir, Novehmbor-Dezembor '25 pan bori dista. Fakt Panchang rer dol thevrat 'kaaran tumka khabar na kaim akrit Rahu Kalam kednn baahir yetli aani tumchea yojnak lochaant uddoiteli. Tumchea kutumbhi pandit ji-kode suchna gheiat bara.
normalised: aani thodde fuddem vichaar kortale, Novembara December doon hazaar ponchis chitrungi distaa. fakt Panchang-acher dyaan divchea kaaraan kedench ekdem Rahu Kalam uktaaun yetolo aani tumchea yojnaank vikhandit kortolo he kalleem. tumchea gharaantlea Pandit ji-chea sangataant rava.

unnormalised: Mhunnun, atanch te jaagim aani caterer-ank book korunk suru korat, lokanno. Gambhirpane. Tumchennim shevttachea velar uthhal-pathhal korunk zaina. Sukhi yojna!
normalised: Tora, aaichi venue aani caterers book karun ghea. kharcheponan. tumkaank kuttich chintpaani poddpaak zaina. Sukhee yojnaa!
